name: Angel Wings
description:
Angel Wings is a Korean drama-inspired visual novel exploring themes of isolation, dependence, and autonomy set in an unfamiliar new city.

As the player, you begin your journey from rock bottom -- no job, no girlfriend and no motivation — but upon answering a mysterious phone call, you awaken in an unknown place filled with new faces.

Through intricate relationships and thoughtful introspection, will you be able to unravel the reason you are here?
Based on your choices, you will experience love, catharsis, or heartbreak.

Will you soar to new heights, or fly too close to the sun?



Choose Your Fortune - a dynamic story that varies based on your personality type and desires.

  • 9 Playable Storylines
  • 20+ Unique Endings
  • Numerous romantic routes
  • Stunning character sprites, backgrounds and CGs
  • Hours of fun
  • Multiple language support


Angel Wings is a collaboration from the mind of RumR, an established K-pop fanartist and Huskitch, an experienced game developer.

Music provided by Kris Leone and RiXtopia

Additional art and creative support by Adoralla
